00097 // Group inline definitions
00099 
00101 // Update method
00102 // all the groups are updates from #0 to last one
00103 inline void Group::update()
00104 {
00105     for (ListNrnType::iterator i = list_.begin();
00106             i != list_.end();
00107             ++i)
00108         (*i)->update();
00109 }
00110 
00112 // clean the spike list of the neurons up to 'time_end_past' (excluded)
00113 inline void Group::clear_past_of_spike_list(const Time & time_end_past)
00114 {
00115     DataRecordNeuronVisitor vis;
00116     for (ListNrnType::const_iterator i = list_.begin(); i != list_.end(); ++i) {
00117         (*i)->apply_visitor(vis);
00118         //
00119         if (vis.spike_time_list_pointer()) {
00120             std::deque<Time>::iterator j = vis.spike_time_list_pointer()->begin();
00121             for (; j != vis.spike_time_list_pointer()->end();
00122                     ++j)
00123                 if ((*j) > time_end_past) break;
00124             vis.erase_past_spike_list(j);
00125         }
00126         //
00127         vis.reset();
00128     }
00129 }
